article.title: Lockheed Martin Supports Radar Fleet
article.text: Lockheed Martin, Liverpool, N.Y., was awarded a $9,085,206 modification (P00092) to contract W15P7T-06-C-T004 for interim contractor services required to continue support of the AN/TPQ-53 radar fleet. Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen, Md., is the contracting activity.
